import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import "./Cart.css"; import Header from "../Header"; function Cart() { const { state } = useLocation(); return ( <>

Cart Items

{state.cartitems.length === 0 && (

More Shoping Please Click on Home Button

)}
{state.cartitems.map((item) => (

Item Name : {item.name}

Item Price : {item.quantity} * ${item.price}

Quantity : {item.quantity}

{/*
*/}
))}
Thanks for your submission.

We Will Contact You Soon.

); } export default Cart;
